mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HNYC_HEAD_INFO (msgId, wsMark, wsMethod, wsParam, recvTime, currTime, currUser, recvInfo) VALUES ( #{msg_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ws_mark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ws_method, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ws_param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recv_time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{curr_time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{curr_user, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recv_info, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE HNYC_HEAD_INFO SET wsMark = #{ws_mark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wsMethod = #{ws_method, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wsParam = #{ws_param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recvTime = #{recv_time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, currTime = #{curr_time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, currUser = #{curr_user, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recvInfo = #{recv_info, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE msgId = #{msg_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
